mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (resourceId, uresource_uuid, name, description, url, type, priority, parent_id, parent_ids, permission, icon, available, create_time, update_time) values (#{resourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uresourceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_resource set uresource_uuid = #{uresourceUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where resourceId = #{resourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select resourceId, uresource_uuid, name, description, url, type, priority, parent_id, parent_ids, permission, icon, available, create_time, update_time from sys_resource where resourceId = #{resourceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
